snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio took his disdain for The New York Post to a new level at a news conference Thursday, pointedly ignoring the tabloid’s City Hall bureau chief and sharply criticizing its coverage....
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio ignores New York Post's City Hall bureau chief, Yoav Gonen, during press conference, saying he had 'no use for right-wing 'rag,' and he was only going to 'call on real media outlets'; display of public disdain reflects escalation of longstanding war between de Blasio and tabloids, which political operatives say serve no purpose.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio took his disdain for The New York Post to a new level at a news conference Thursday, pointedly ignoring the tabloid’s City Hall bureau chief and sharply criticizing its coverage.

headline.main: De Blasio Snubs New York Post Reporter and Calls Paper a ‘Right-Wing Rag’
headline.print_headline: To Mayor, New York Post Is Now a ‘Right-Wing Rag’
